DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; ENGLAND ; PRINCESS DI HELPS SAVE DROWNING MAN
DOC.TEXT: Princess Diana is being hailed as a heroine for helping to save a drowning vagrant . The princess was_on her way home from a jog in London ' s Regents Park on Sunday when tourists flagged her car , pointed to a bridge_over the narrow lake and said someone had fallen in.Diana , still in running_shoes and shorts , reportedly told her chauffeur to call police on the car phone , then dashed to the bridge where she was joined by Kari Kotila , 29 , a Finnish student living_in London . Kotila , followed by Diana , climbed over the parapet of the bridge onto the bank of the lake . The Finn then swam to the 42-year-old Irish vagrant , by then unconscious , and towed him to the bank .
